d.BookingTerms:
FAMILY RESORTS / HIGH SEASON

REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive Week, Anniversary Week
If reservation is cancelled or modified 30 days or less prior to the arrival date, 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay.

NON-REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive, Anniversary
Only modifications are allowed, cancelation of reservation will result on forfeiting the total amount paid. Please consider that, if modified 30 days or less prior to the arrival date, 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay. As well, the member will need to cover any difference in rate (if any).

 

Reservations for Imperial (Week & Nights), Bonus or Rewards
If reservation is cancelled or modified 30 days or less prior to the arrival date, the provisions will be forfeited.

*Bonus weeks: Are considered final transactions and changes are not allowed. In case of a change or a cancellation, the Bonus weeks will be forfeited.

*One- or three-night penalty fee will apply to NO SHOWS depending on the season.

*The lodging and services included provided in this confirmation Apply only once any duplication of it, shall be covered by the member(s) at the current preferential rate.

 

FAMILY RESORTS / REGULAR SEASON

REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive Week, Anniversary Week
If reservation is cancelled or modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay.


NON-REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive, Anniversary
Only modifications are allowed, cancelation of reservation will result on forfeiting the total amount paid, including the extra fees involved. Please consider that if modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date, 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay. As well, the member will need to cover any difference in rate (if any).

 

Reservations for Imperial (Week & Nights), Bonus or Rewards
If reservation is cancelled or modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date, the provisions will be forfeited.

*Bonus weeks: Are considered final transactions and changes are not allowed. In case of a change or a cancellation, the Bonus weeks will be forfeited.

*One- or three-night penalty fee will apply to NO SHOWS depending on the season.

*The lodging and services included provided in this confirmation Apply only once any duplication of it, shall be covered by the member(s) at the current preferential rate.

 

ADULTS ONLY RESORTS / HIGH SEASON AND REGULAR SEASON

REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive Week, Anniversary Week
If reservation is cancelled or modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay.

NON-REFUNDABLE Reservations paid with Preferential Rate, Referrals, Incentive, Anniversary
Only modifications are allowed, cancelation of reservation will result on forfeiting the whole amount that was paid. Please consider that if modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date, 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply. This night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay. As well, the member will need to cover any difference in rate (if any).

Reservations for Imperial (Week & Nights), Bonus or Rewards
If reservation is cancelled or modified 3 days or less prior to the arrival date, the provisions will be forfeited.

*Bonus weeks: Are considered final transactions and changes are not allowed. In case of a change or a cancellation, the Bonus weeks will be forfeited.

*One- or three-night penalty fee will apply to NO SHOWS depending on the season.

*The lodging and services included provided in this confirmation Apply only once any duplication of it, shall be covered by the member(s) at the current preferential rate.

 

RESERVATIONS FOR VILLAS AND RESIDENCE SUITES

Villas & Residence Suites:
If reservation is cancelled or modified 30 days or less prior to the arrival date, 1 Night Penalty Fee will apply, this night will be equivalent to the prorated cost of the stay. This applies for all type of Seasons & Resorts.

*The suites’ access for the corresponding anniversary year will be forfeited*

*One- or three-night penalty fee will apply to NO SHOWS depending on the season.

*The lodging and services included provided in this confirmation Apply only once any duplication of it, shall be covered by the member(s) at the current preferential rate.
